D

displayMenuAndReadOption() - Method in class cat.proven.currencyconverter.Menu
displays menu and gets user's option
doAddCurrency() - Method in class cat.proven.currencyconverter.Main
reads currency name and value from user adds the information to map of currencies and report result to user
doCalculateChange() - Method in class cat.proven.currencyconverter.Main
reads from user currency names (source and target) and the amount to change, then calculates change in target currency and displays result to user
doExit() - Method in class cat.proven.currencyconverter.Main
asks for confirmation and exits application
doListAllCurrencies() - Method in class cat.proven.currencyconverter.Main
gets all currency names and displays them
doModifyCurrency() - Method in class cat.proven.currencyconverter.Main
reads currency name and new value from user, searches currency and displays name and value to user, asks for confirmation and, if so, modifies value of currency
doRemoveCurrency() - Method in class cat.proven.currencyconverter.Main
reads currency name from user, searches currency and displays name and value to user, asks for confirmation and, if so, removes currency
doShowValueOfCurrency() - Method in class cat.proven.currencyconverter.Main
read from user a currency name, gets its value (if found) and displays it If not found, it reports error to user
